item.description:
Hi everyone,

One of our former Assistant Organizers, Rio, will be joining us from Japan on this Saturday.  He will be bringing with him a few bottles of Yamanashi wine from Japan (and by 'wine', I really mean wine, not sake).  Yamanashi is Japan's version of the United States' Napa and Sonoma Valleys.

We'll incorporate this event into our Prudential Meetup dinner, so please come over to the Prudential Meetup before we depart for dinner.

If you cannot make it to the Prudential in time, please contact Kaylee or myself so that we can tell you where our group will be eating.

If possible, please bring a donation of at least $5 for Japan's relief effort.
item.name: Yamanashi Wine Tasting
